citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
This facility has a part-time attending veterinarian however there is no written program of veterinary care present. In
the case of a part - time veterinarian, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and
regularly scheduled visits to the research facility.
CORRECT BY : 12-8-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the animal facility supervisor.

narrative:
2.33(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
This facility has a part-time attending veterinarian however there is no written program of veterinary care present. In
the case of a part - time veterinarian, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and
regularly scheduled visits to the research facility. 
CORRECT BY : 12-8-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the animal facility supervisor.
